hackathon-description-text: Welcome to MasseyHacks IV, Canada’s biggest MLH high school hackathon. At this event, hundreds of high school students from Canada and parts of the US come together at Vincent Massey Secondary School to experiment, connect and create in 24 hours. We hope you're as excited as we are for an awesome weekend!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: What did you learn this weekend? If at least half of the hackers on your team have never attended a university hackathon, we'd love to meet you and hear more about what you built! We'll invite one of the teams that chats with us to build a new project at Hack the North in September.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1800 Liberty St, Windsor, ON N9E 2Y3, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We are looking for hacks that are polished, original, technically difficult, and have real-world impact.

hackathon-location-address: 1800 Liberty St, Windsor, ON N9E 2Y3, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Canada's Biggest MLH Certified HS Hackathon
